column1: Bananas—Average retail price per pound and per cup equivalent, 2016

1The USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference(SR) reports that the inedible skin of a raw banana accounts for 36 percent of the fruit's weight, implying a preparation yield of 64 percent, when eaten raw.

Source: Calculated by USDA, Economic Research Service, from 2016 IRI Infoscan data; the USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference (SR), Release 26; and the Food Patterns Equivalents Database (FPED) 2013-14 as well as the FPED's accompanying Methodology and User Guide.
